content: What an incredible story. Something similar happened to me two years ago, and it really was the best thing that ever happened to me. I had no idea I was running on fumes until I collapsed. Now, I work from home as a freelance writer who specializes in natural health and wellness. Behold, the power of sleep! http://itoldyouiwassick.info/2016/09/19/the-importance-of-being-a-self-care-advocate-when-living-with-chronic-illness/
